main event: On 23 May 1955, a black cigar-shaped object was observed in Elyria, Ohio for three seconds at a very high altitude.
interesting points: The object was the size of a B-47 type aircraft., The sighting lasted for only three seconds., There were many visual activities reported in the area during the sighting., Due to the poor visibility and short observation time, no further investigation was deemed necessary., Multiple conclusions were drawn including possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: Observers reported the sighting with good visibility in an area with heavy air traffic.
